name: Mana Burst
description:
Survive enemy onslaught to reach your full potential!

- Arcade action style.

- Kill bosses, acquire power obs to unleash your full mana powers.

- It start off slow, but eventually you get enemy swarm/ enemy bullet hell.

- Beatable in one play session.

Simple Controls:
Use WASD to MOVE, LEFT CLICK mouse button to shoot.

SPACEBAR - Mana Bomb.
